description: This is a CMake configuration file that sets up environment variables, system parameters, and includes additional configuration scripts for cross-compilation targeting Linux systems within the build toolchain.

methods.name: file(GLOB ...)
methods.description: Globally includes all CMake scripts within a specific directory pattern.

methods.name: include(...)
methods.description: Includes additional CMake configuration files dynamically.

methods.name: set(...)
methods.description: Assigns values to CMake variables for configuration purposes.
